articles.author: Ryan Smith
articles.title: No new deaths or Covid-19 cases in South Tyneside as borough remains among highest rates of infection in country - Shields Gazette
articles.description: Public Health have confirmed there are two new cases of coronavirus in South Tyneside as the borough’s NHS trust announces no new deaths for the second day running. Across the region, there has been a slight rise of 58 cases.
articles.content:
Public Health England have confirmed today (Friday, May 29) that there are two new cases of Covid-19 in South Tyneside.
The total number of people who have tested positive for the illness in the bor… [+3976 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Coronavirus: Another 377 people with COVID-19 die in UK as total passes 37,800 - Sky News
articles.description: The latest daily figure by the Department of Health is for coronavirus-related deaths in hospitals, care homes and the community.
